document_data.name: Pain Touch
document_data.mainbody: '''''Pain touch''''' was an [[Arcane magic|arcane]] [[spell]] from the school of [[necromancy]] that allowed a [[wizard]] to induce extreme pain with a touch.
document_data.Powers: The caster could affect a single target once they touched an exposed part of their skin. The wracking pain made the victim more clumsy and easier to strike in combat.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s a needle and the finger from a burned glove to cast.
document_data.History: This spell was found within the ''[[Book of Shadows]]'', a [[tome]] based upon the oration of the [[necromancer]] [[Nebt Bhakau]] of [[Zakhara]].
